GermanWings 9525 - Villagers in Alps show solidarity and are welcoming victims families in hotels and their homes for free. Have also set-up a temporary chapel in the school gym and offered to act as translators to the families.

Aviation expert: the cockpit of an A320 was designed so that only a conscious person inside could keep others locked out. One of the pilots must have consciously overriden emergency code used by flight crew to access the cockpit
